member.name: T:System.ITryDisposable
member.summary: wrapper for objects retrieved from a creation design pattern such as a factory. If the type interface does not expose , but the concrete implementation does, this wrapper makes it possible to call Dispose on the object in a consistent manner. It also allows the class to be used in a using statement.
